ci_support_linux_.yaml:
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    max_pin: x.x
    min_pin: x.x
python:
- '2.7'

about.description: straight-forward creation of CIFTI files and the reading and manipulating of existing one. Cifti wraps around nibabel <http://nipy.org/nibabel> to provide easier acces to CIFTI <https://www.nitrc.org/projects/cifti/> files
about.summary: Creation of new CIFTI files and the reading and manipulating of existing ones

about.description: straight-forward creation of CIFTI files and the reading and manipulating of existing one. Cifti wraps around nibabel <http://nipy.org/nibabel> to provide easier acces to CIFTI <https://www.nitrc.org/projects/cifti/> files
about.summary: Creation of new CIFTI files and the reading and manipulating of existing ones

name: cifti
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "cifti" %}
{% set version = "1.1" %}
{% set sha256 = "e9fef71c069155ba4ab48b2d13974baf471be64ff18b474cf825abc7d02a54d3" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: python -m pip install --no-deps --ignore-installed .

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - pip
  run:
    - python
    - numpy
    - nibabel
    - six

test:
  imports:
    - cifti
    - cifti.tests

about:
  home: https://github.com/MichielCottaar/cifti
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'Creation of new CIFTI files and the reading and manipulating of existing ones'
  description: 
    straight-forward creation of CIFTI files and the reading and manipulating 
    of existing one. Cifti wraps around nibabel <http://nipy.org/nibabel> to 
    provide easier acces to CIFTI <https://www.nitrc.org/projects/cifti/> files

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - MichielCottaar
